thread.title: Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief

title: Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief
text:
Tiger in Hungarian zoo treated with stem cells for pain relief 6:16pm BST - 01:03 
A Siberian tiger in a Hungarian zoo receives stem cell joint treatment which doctors hope will help heal his hip and allow him to live happily without needing to be given painkillers. Jim Drury reports.   
A Siberian tiger in a Hungarian zoo receives stem cell joint treatment which doctors hope will help heal his hip and allow him to live happily without needing to be given painkillers. Jim Drury reports.  //reut.rs/2HL44jc
